sections.title: What is MetaData?
sections.text: Haptrix allows you to store additional fields of pertinent information along with your Haptic file.

sections.title: What MetaData do we support?
sections.text: See the Fields below for what fields we currently support in the MetaData section

sections.title: Field: Project
sections.text: You may have multiple Haptic files in your Project, you can use the Project field to group them

sections.title: Field: Created
sections.text: A string representing the date the file was created

sections.title: Field: Title
sections.text: A short sentence explaining the file

sections.title: Field: Description
sections.text: A couple of sentences explaining the file

sections.title: Field: Tags
sections.text: A comma separated array of searchable keywords that represent the feeling of the experience
